description: A customizable autocomplete component used to create searchable text inputs.

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the autocomplete should have a border.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to host element.

properties.name: debounceMs
properties.description: The debounce timeout in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable debouncing.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the form control is disabled.

properties.name: includeClear
properties.description: Show the clear button within the input field.

properties.name: includeSearch
properties.description: Show the search icon within the input field.

properties.name: inputId
properties.description: The ID of the input element.

properties.name: inputTabIndex
properties.description: Determine the control's relative ordering for sequential focus navigation (typically with the Tab key).

properties.name: items
properties.description: The items to display in the menu. Creating a new array of items will ensure proper component re-render.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: leaveMenuOpen
properties.description: Whether the menu should remain open after an item is selected.

properties.name: minChars
properties.description: The minimum number of characters required to render the menu.

properties.name: multiSelect
properties.description: Whether the input allows multiple items to be selected.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: noResults
properties.description: The content to display when no results are found.
properties.default: {     ariaLabel: 'No results found',     label: 'No results found',     subLabel: 'Check spelling or try a different keyword',   }

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: Whether the value is editable.

properties.name: required
properties.description: A value is required for the form to be submittable.

properties.name: showMenuOnFocus
properties.description: Whether to show the menu whenever the input has focus, regardless of input value.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the autocomplete (input and menu).

properties.name: showSpinner
properties.description: A spinner that appears when set to true

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the control.

properties.name: maxChips
properties.description: Maximum number of chips to display. When exceeded, shows expand/collapse button. Set to -1 to disable limit.

properties.name: customItemSelect
properties.description: Custom item selection handler - if provided, overrides default selection logic

properties.name: customInputChange
properties.description: Custom input change handler - if provided, overrides default search filtering

properties.name: customKeyDown
properties.description: Custom key down handler - if provided, overrides default keyboard navigation

properties.name: customBlur
properties.description: Custom blur handler - if provided, overrides default blur behavior

properties.name: minInputWidth
properties.description: Minimum width for the text input in pixels. When chips would make input smaller, container height increases instead.

events.name: chipRemove
events.description: Event emitted when a selected item chip is removed.

events.name: chipsExpansionChange
events.description: Event emitted when chips expansion state changes.

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Event emitted when the input loses focus.

events.name: inputChange
events.description: Event emitted when the input value changes. This event is debounced based on the debounceMs prop.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Event emitted when the input gains focus.

events.name: itemSelect
events.description: Event emitted when a menu item is selected.

methods.name: clearInput
methods.description: Clear the input value and reset items

examples.basic:
<style>
  div[id^='story--components-forms-autocomplete--default'] {
    height: 400px;
  }
</style>
<modus-wc-autocomplete
  aria-label="Fruit autocomplete"
  ?bordered=${args.bordered}
  custom-class=${ifDefined(args['custom-class'])}
  debounce-ms=${ifDefined(args['debounce-ms'])}
  ?disabled=${args.disabled}
  ?include-clear=${args['include-clear']}
  ?include-search=${args['include-search']}
  input-id=${ifDefined(args['input-id'])}
  input-tab-index=${ifDefined(args['input-tab-index'])}
  .items=${args.items}
  label=${ifDefined(args.label)}
  ?leave-menu-open=${args['leave-menu-open']}
  min-chars=${args['min-chars']}
  min-input-width=${ifDefined(args['min-input-width'])}
  ?multi-select=${false}
  name=${ifDefined(args.name)}
  .noResults=${args['no-results']}
  placeholder=${ifDefined(args.placeholder)}
  ?read-only=${args['read-only']}
  ?required=${args.required}
  ?show-menu-on-focus=${args['show-menu-on-focus']}
  ?show-spinner=${args['show-spinner']}
  size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
  value=${args.value}
></modus-wc-autocomplete>

args.label: 'No results found'
args.subLabel: 'Check spelling or try a different keyword'
